dataTypes.name: Cost Centers
dataTypes.query: SELECT id as value, id || ' - ' || name as label FROM your_database.your_schema.cost_centers WHERE (? = '' OR UPPER(description) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(id) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(name) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%')) ORDER BY id LIMIT 100

dataTypes.name: WBS Elements
dataTypes.query: SELECT code as value, code || ' - ' || description as label FROM your_database.your_schema.wbs_elements WHERE (? = '' OR UPPER(description) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(code) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%')) ORDER BY code LIMIT 100

dataTypes.name: Departments
dataTypes.query: SELECT dept_code as value, dept_code || ' - ' || dept_name as label FROM your_database.your_schema.departments WHERE (? = '' OR UPPER(dept_name) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%') OR UPPER(dept_code) LIKE UPPER('%' || ? || '%')) ORDER BY dept_code LIMIT 100
